Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance your business operations. Given its high value and potential impact on your endeavors, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This is a special opportunity tailored to recognize your discerning taste and strategic acumen. I am confident that this investment will yield substantial returns for you. Should you have any questions or require further details, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of partnering with you on this exciting venture. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
